document.full_text: with no sign of judgment day arriving as he had forecast, the 89-year-old california evangelical broadcaster and former civil engineer behind the pronouncement seemed to have gone silent on saturday.
document.title: broadcaster silent as "judgment day" hours tick by
lines_and_colors: with no sign of judgment day arriving as he had forecast, the 89-year-old california evangelical broadcaster and former civil engineer behind the pronouncement seemed to have gone silent on saturday.
